QuestData.Title: Eye See You
QuestData.Description: There is being blind, and then there is being stupid.$b$bThis eyeless wonder next to me wants to barrel into Felblaze Ingress without preparation.$b$bBah! I say we scout it first.$b$bHere, I will provide you with an extra eye I picked up from a place better left unmentioned.$b$BEnter Felblaze Ingress, investigate the area, and try not to get poked in the eye.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Tehd's Eye of Kilrogg to investigate Felblaze Ingress.
QuestData.CompletionText: Don't ask where I got the eye. Worst case is I tell you and then it gets all awkward between us.
QuestData.RewardText: Why? Why would demons, of all things, be this bad at summoning their own kind?
